last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 208
last_episode_to_air.overview: Recovering from Rhea letting Cameron down, a mishap at their planned wedding venue throws Cameron and Rhea into a panic.

name: Take My Wife
overview: Follows real life couple Cameron Esposito and Rhea Butcher as they share their lives as stand up comics who are balancing work, relationships, and the breaking down of gender barriers.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In Take My Wife, Cameron Esposito and Rhea Butcher find that daily struggles make for good comedy -and stand-up makes for good couples therapy - in this charming and personal show created, starring and produced by an actually gay, actually married couple.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: We left Season 1 with Cameron getting her own headlining tour and Rhea about to choose between opening for Cameron or Bob. Season 2 of Take My Wife finds Cameron and Rhea on the road -- on different tours!

episodes.name: Set-up
episodes.overview: Wives, Rhea and Cameron, navigate life as comedians. Rhea struggles balancing a day job and her life on stage. Cameron experiences online backlash for her comedy.

episodes.name: Punchline
episodes.overview: Onstage and offstage, entirely within a single performance of their weekly stand-up show, Cameron and Rhea wrangle the chaos that comes with hosting a bunch of comics. This episode gives a first-person view into those things a live stand-up audience doesn't get to see.

episodes.name: Applause Break
episodes.overview: In her newfound free time, Rhea finds increasingly silly reasons to avoid focusing on comedy. Cameron gets some harsh lessons in stand-up while opening for a big-deal headlining comic on tour.

episodes.name: Opener
episodes.overview: Cameron and Rhea discuss their future, and get in over their heads babysitting an infant. While Cameron and Dave try to get out of trouble one way, Rhea finds help from Frances, their eccentric neighbor.

episodes.name: Feature
episodes.overview: Cameron begins coaching a famous actress on how play a comic, but finds out the actress has other ideas. After a financial disaster, Rhea secretly returns to her old job.

episodes.name: Headliner
episodes.overview: When Cameron is tempted by Melina the actress, and Rhea has to confront her student loan debt, they face a big decision together. Their neighbor Frances offers more surprising insight.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In Take My Wife, Cameron Esposito and Rhea Butcher find that daily struggles make for good comedy -and stand-up makes for good couples therapy - in this charming and personal show created, starring and produced by an actually gay, actually married couple.

episodes.name: Episode 201
episodes.overview: Cameron and Rhea perform on different stages in Portland; in this rare chance to see each other, they still can't see enough of each other; Cameron realizes she needs a new opener and Rhea decides to join Cameron on tour.

episodes.name: Episode 202
episodes.overview: Cameron and Rhea are at home between tour dates and use the time to dive into wedding planning!

episodes.name: Episode 203
episodes.overview: As Cameron and Rhea hit the road, they learn the realities of being two women on tour: They get to celebrate with fans, but they also need to prioritize their safety.

episodes.name: Episode 204
episodes.overview: Cameron and Rhea realize they both have clutter in their lives. Rhea keeps everything and has a closet overflowing with keepsakes that have outlived their usefulness. Cameron, on the other hand, keeps ex-girlfriends for the sake of familiarity.

episodes.name: Episode 205
episodes.overview: Leading up to their sets at Best Bet, three female comedians navigate their respective worlds, and we see how their experiences inform their comedy.

episodes.name: Episode 206
episodes.overview: After Cameron's wedding suit shows up unwearable and Rhea lands a last-minute audition for a TV show, they decide to call off their joint bachelor party.

episodes.name: Episode 207
episodes.overview: Cameron preps nervously for her stand-up special, accompanied by her ex-girlfriend Brie who is barely surviving a breakup. Meanwhile, Rhea is having the time of her life on the set of Bob's TV show.

episodes.name: Episode 208
episodes.overview: Recovering from Rhea letting Cameron down, a mishap at their planned wedding venue throws Cameron and Rhea into a panic.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: We left Season 1 with Cameron getting her own headlining tour and Rhea about to choose between opening for Cameron or Bob. Season 2 of Take My Wife finds Cameron and Rhea on the road -- on different tours!
